name: Big Chungus Demo
description:
In This game you're gonna become a Big Chungus (legendary meme) and try to eat as many carrots as possible.

Requirements :

Minimum :

Windows 7

1 GHz CPU or better

1 GB of RAM

200 MB on Hard Drive

DirectX 9 support

Internet access

Recommended :

Windows 10

Intel Pentium G4560 or better

4 GB of RAM

200 MB on Hard Drive

DirectX 10 support

Speakers

Internet Access
